About Me | Back

I am currently working as a Postdoctoral fellow on survival analysis at University Lyon 1.

I have created for example nnetsauce, a general-purpose Python package for Statistical/Machine Learning and crossval, an R package offering generic validation functions for predictive models (oh, and this webpage, with a little bit of HTML and Javascript). For more details on nnetsauce and crossval, see here and here.

If you enjoy using these packages, or find any of my different contents useful, feel free to contact me, Paypal me, or buy me a coffee.
